title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Online Language Learning Design Balancing Constructivism and Instructionism

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can write scientific paper abstracts in English and complete constructivist project-based assignments over three times.
Learners can reduce error rates by 40% when creating academic presentation materials using grammar/vocabulary modules based on the instructivist approach.
Learners can successfully complete over two formative assessments by combining peer feedback and AI automated scoring systems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
